p:
According to this method, 1 mL of the Folin–Ciocâlteu reagent (10-fold dilution) was added to 50 µL of the extract. After 3 min, 1 mL of 10% sodium carbonate was added to the solution. The resulting solution was incubated at room temperature for 1 h after which its absorbance was read at 750 nm with an APPEL spectrophotometer
95 .
